name: tm82
effect: Teaches Sleep Talk to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Dragon Tail to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Sleep Talk)

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: While it is asleep, the user randomly uses one of the moves it knows.
flavor_text.platinum: While it is asleep, the user randomly uses one of the moves it knows.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: While it is asleep, the user randomly uses one of the moves it knows.
